ingredients.ingredient: Â½ (17.5 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed
7 slices mild Cheddar cheese, or as needed

cookingTips: Keep puff pastry cold and thaw only partially for easier handling
Roll tightly and cut with a sharp knife to prevent crushing the layers
Chill assembled pinwheels before baking for better puff and shape retention
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Why is it important to keep puff pastry cold throughout preparation?
